artist: Artist: Utagawa Hiroshige; Publisher: Kawaguchiya Shōzō
catalogue_raissonne: Ukiyo-e shūka 14 (1981), Hiroshige list, p. 240, chūtanzaku #13.1
creditline: Gift of Louis W. Hill, Jr.
inscription:
Konna yo ga/ mata mo arō ka/ tsuki ni kari こむな夜か　又も有うか　月に雁
(Will it come again--/ another night like this one?/ Wild geese and the moon.)
(trans. Alfred H. Marks)

HIROSHIGE:Birds and Flowers 
George Braziller, Inc., 1988
pl.35
medium: Woodblock print (nishiki-e); ink and color on paper
portfolio: From Untitled series of pictures of flowers and birds with poem in chūtanzaku
title: Geese Flying across Full Moon
